name: Sk1er LLC
description: Contributions to the Hyperium Minecraft Client.

projects.name: Hyperium
projects.description: A free, open-source Minecraft client that aims to improve the vanilla experience. I contributed to the client by adding a few features, fixing bugs, and improving the codebase. Honestly, I attribute the start of my programming career to this client, it was a fun start to the journey!
